Developed by Kojima Productions and PlatinumGames, METAL GEAR RISING:
REVENGEANCE takes the renowned METAL GEAR franchise into exciting new
territory with an all-new action experience. The game seamlessly melds
pure action and epic story-telling that surrounds Raiden - a child soldier
transformed into a half-human, half-cyborg ninja who uses his High Frequency
katana blade to cut through any thing that stands in his vengeful path

A huge success on both Xbox 360r and PlayStationr3, METAL GEAR RISING
REVENGEANCE comes to PC with all the famed moves and action running within
a beautifully-realised HD environment

This new PC version includes all three DLC missions: Blade Wolf, Jetstream,
and VR Missions, in addition to all customized body upgrades for Raiden,
including: White Armor, Inferno Armor, Commando Armor, Raiden's MGS4 body,
and the ever-popular Cyborg Ninja
